entries.Description: Choose up to Charisma mod (min 1) creatures in spell range to automatically succeed spell saving throw.
Spell range is doubled, or 30 feet if range is 'touch.'
Reroll up to Charisma mod (min 1) damage dice.
Double duration of spell with duration at least 1 minute, up to 24 hours.
Give one target of spell disadvantage on first saving throw made against the spell.
Change casting time of 1 action to 1 bonus action.
Cast spell without somatic or verbal components.
Target second creature with spell that normally has 1 non-self target.
